Overview.Title: Assessing relevance of a web page to a health topic
Overview.FormattedContent:
Consider the following topic:
Drinking too much water

Relevance criteria:
The returned documents should discuss either the causes of polydipsia, how much water it is safe to drink in a day, or side effects of drinking too much water. Results that discuss diabetes mellitus, diabetes insipidus, hyponatremia and seizure risk should be included.

Open the link in each question, read the web page content, and assess the content relevance to the above topic!
